message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $150. I believe it's a great deal and will be valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $90 is too low, I'm willing to come down a bit. How about $130?
I'm still a bit above my budget, would you be willing to go down to $110? I really like the product and want to make a deal
